BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACTPAY_EXT_DED_SPECS_TRN_LOG (STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER,DT_OF_APPLICABLE,STR_DED_CODE,NUM_AMOUNT,GNUM_SLNO,GNUM_ISVALID,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) select STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER,DT_OF_APPLICABLE,STR_DED_CODE,NUM_AMOUNT,?,GNUM_ISVALID,?,?,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE FROM ACTPAY_EXT_DED_SPECS_TRN T WHERE T.STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER=? AND T.DT_OF_APPLICABLE=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND T.GNUM_ISVALID=1
DELETE FROM ACTPAY_EXT_DED_SPECS_TRN T WHERE T.STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER=? AND T.DT_OF_APPLICABLE=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND T.GNUM_ISVALID=1
UPDATE ACTPAY_EXT_DED_SPECS_TRN T SET T.GNUM_ISVALID=0, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER=? AND T.DT_OF_APPLICABLE=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
